text: Norman McCabe (February 10, 1911 â€“ January 17, 2006) was an American animator, cartoonist, and director. He is famous for creating animated cartoons during the Golden Age of Hollywood. He did his most major work for the Warner Bros. studios. He created the characters of Porky Pig and Daffy Duck. His had an effect on almost all of the animated cartoon series by various studios in the 1940s. == Other websites == * Category:1911 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:American animators
title: Norman McCabe
